Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class QuizzleServer extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • acceptDuration
          int acceptDuration
          The match invitation time to live. It's an int stating how many seconds a match invitation shall remain valid. It's specified by command line.
        • database
          QuizzleDatabase database
          The QuizzleDatabase. Initialized upon server creation. It first tries to deserialize, if exists, the Database.json file and, if it doesn't, it creates it.
        • mainChannel
          java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel mainChannel
          The channel for the server's TCP socket on which it accepts new connection requests. Initialized upon server creation.
        • mainPort
          int mainPort
          The port on which the server listens for connections. Can be specified by command line.
        • matchAddressBook
          java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.net.InetSocketAddress> matchAddressBook
          The data structure used by QuizzleServer to keep trace of online users IP addresses that will be used for UDP communication during match invitation. For every logged user u the key is the u's nickname and the value is u's datagram socket's address. It's used to send match invitations.
        • matchDuration
          int matchDuration
          The match duration in minutes. It's an int stating how many minutes a match shall last. It's specified by command line.
        • numWords
          int numWords
          The number of words to be displayed during a match. Is an int stating how many english words the server shall provide to the players. It's specified by command line.
        • onlineUsers
          java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> onlineUsers
          The data structure used by QuizzleServer to keep trace of online users. For every logged user u the key is the server port number on which the connection with the client of u is taking place and the value is u's nickname. It's also used to check if the requested operation is legal during task execution.
        • postDepot
          java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue<QuizzleMail> postDepot
          The post depot.
        • probeChannel
          java.nio.channels.DatagramChannel probeChannel
          The channel for the server's UDP socket on which it communicates the InetSocketAddress of TCPsocket to the clients sending probing UDP datagrams.
        • probePort
          int probePort
          The port on which the server listens for clients probe UDP datagrams. Can be specified by command line.
        • selector
          java.nio.channels.Selector selector
          The selector. Initialized upon server creation.
        • threadpool
          java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor threadpool
          The threadpool. Initialized upon server creation. The number of threads is currently hardcoded to four as most cpus nowadays have two cores with four threads.
        • threads
          int threads
          The maximum number of threads in the threadpool, an hihg number would be useful for executing multiple MatchTasks at the same time.
